actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of the heirs of Clark M. Beggerly, Sr., of Jackson County, Mississippi.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay the heirs of Clark M. Beggerly, Sr., of Jackson County, Mississippi, a specified sum in settlement of all claims arising out of the taking by the United States of certain parcels of land on Horn Island.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of the heirs of Clark M. Beggerly, Sr., of Jackson County, Mississippi.
